author: Luis Gabriel Gerena
comment: You Eric, if you were able to read you will see that it requires Watchmaker to work not android wear app. So instead of giving a one start rating to the app give the one star to your rating comprehension.
title: The retard below cant read

author: Eric Siebert
comment: Watch face will not show up in Android Wear app or watch. Restarted both and resynced apps and still nothing.
title: Paid for it and got nothing

author: Fred Schmitthammer
comment: I am a huge digital fan! Prado watch faces always provide great features. Thanks!
title: What A Great Watch Face
